title: >>> Where STARS are Born
body_text:
TOM FUND Presentation
It's been 5 weeks ... time has run out!
Finally, the pizza man is rewarded for his generosity. Week after week after week, tasty, delicious pizzas were served for absolutely nothing thanks to Luke. It is time to give a little something back to simply show
our
appreciation.
The first time Luke delivered pizza was at DODGEBALL LX3 on November 11, 2006.
~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~
Power MUSIC
Those that read the previous entry already know of the completed playlist set to debut at DODGEBALL 80. Dance, rock, rap; it's all here. Get ready for music every competitor
will
enjoy.
"All My Life" by the Foo Fighters is the DODGEBALL 80 theme song.
~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~
MEGILL vs. EDWARDS
You've heard the stories. All that's left is the showdown itself.
There isn't a better way to conclude Season 8 than with a classic battle pitting two of dodgeball's biggest names. The almighty Kevin Megill, one of the most feared competitors ever, enters DODGEBALL 80 against athletic dodger, the speedy Mike Edwards. This one will absolutely steal the show, so do not miss out.
This is Mike Edwards' first time as captain; Kevin Megill's fourth.
~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~
"Returning to Action ..."
The ten events bring out the best in every competitor. For those that have been absent, you may just  see some old faces return.
Which past legends will return to the dance? Will DODGEBALL 80 emerge with new faces?
DODGEBALL 80: Where STARS are Born!
body_html:
TOM FUND Presentation
It's been 5 weeks ... time has run out!

Finally, the pizza man is rewarded for his generosity. Week after week after week, tasty, delicious pizzas were served for absolutely nothing thanks to Luke. It is time to give a little something back to simply show our appreciation.

The first time Luke delivered pizza was at DODGEBALL LX3 on November 11, 2006.
~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~
Power MUSIC
Those that read the previous entry already know of the completed playlist set to debut at DODGEBALL 80. Dance, rock, rap; it's all here. Get ready for music every competitor will enjoy.

"All My Life" by the Foo Fighters is the DODGEBALL 80 theme song.
~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~
MEGILL vs. EDWARDS
You've heard the stories. All that's left is the showdown itself.

There isn't a better way to conclude Season 8 than with a classic battle pitting two of dodgeball's biggest names. The almighty Kevin Megill, one of the most feared competitors ever, enters DODGEBALL 80 against athletic dodger, the speedy Mike Edwards. This one will absolutely steal the show, so do not miss out.

This is Mike Edwards' first time as captain; Kevin Megill's fourth.
~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~
"Returning to Action ..."
The ten events bring out the best in every competitor. For those that have been absent, you may just see some old faces return.

Which past legends will return to the dance? Will DODGEBALL 80 emerge with new faces?

DODGEBALL 80: Where STARS are Born!
